name: Kuunganisha
description: The Kuunganisha is a small fiend characterized by its cunning and devious nature, often serving as a familiar or ally to more powerful masters.
memorable: It can slip into invisibility and regenerate, allowing it to survive longer in combat.
goals: Typically serves as an ally to more powerful beings or masters.
relations: Often associated with evil beings and masters who wield magical powers.
environment: Typically found in places associated with evil or dark magic.
strengths: Has magic resistance, regenerates health, and can become invisible.
weaknesses: Low physical strength limits direct attacks.
attacks: Utilizes claw and bite attacks, with potential poison damage from its bite.
most_powerful_ability: Invisibility allows it to disappear until it strikes.
senses: Fiend Sight enables it to see in magical darkness.
skills: Possesses proficiency in insight and stealth, enhancing its tactical abilities.
additional_information: Advantage on saving throws against spells.
Regenerates health at the start of its turn.
Magic can be channeled through it by its master.
Tactically avoids direct confrontation due to low strength.
Effective in stealthy maneuvers due to high dexterity.
test_queries: small fiend with invisibility and regeneration
cunning magical creature that can fly
agile fiend associated with dark magic
devious creature that serves evil masters
small fiend that can become invisible and bite
